content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"This is the UBS Budapest specific extension of the EPAM Business Continuity Program. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"This training references to EPAM Business Continuity Program. Please download the UBS training material by clicking on the below link and read it carefully.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"attachment\",\"data\":{\"size\":92255,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/2379d657-63e9-41a2-84a1-07142623222b/UBS-BUD_BusinessContinuityAndDisasterRecoveryPlan.docx\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/2379d657-63e9-41a2-84a1-07142623222b/UBS-BUD_BusinessContinuityAndDisasterRecoveryPlan.docx\",\"fileName\":\"UBS-BUD_BusinessContinuityAndDisasterRecoveryPlan.docx\",\"name\":\"UBS-BUD_BusinessContinuityAndDisasterRecoveryPlan.docx\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"application\",\"subtype\":\"vnd.openxmlformats-officedocument.wordprocessingml.document\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"attachment\",\"id\":\"2379d657-63e9-41a2-84a1-07142623222b\",\"extension\":\"docx\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
